Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Hotel Turismo in San Martino Buon Albergo, you'll be in the suburbs and convenient to Le Corti Venete. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Castle of Montorio and Verona Uno.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 74 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your Select Comfort bed comes with down comforters. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in San Martino Buon Albergo? This hotel has 807 square feet (75 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.

When you stay at Hotel Turismo in San Martino Buon Albergo, you'll be in the suburbs and convenient to Le Corti Venete. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Castle of Montorio and Verona Uno.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Le Corti Venete - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Castle of Montorio - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Verona Uno - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
University of Verona - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
Giardino Giusti - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
San Fermo Maggiore - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi
Porta Leoni - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi
St. Peter's Castle - 8.8 km / 5.4 mi
Juliet's Tomb - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Biblioteca Civica - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Roman Theater - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
Verona Archeological Museum - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
Juliet's House - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
Basilica di Sant'Anastasia - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
San Giorgetta - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Turismo is Verona (VRN-Valerio Catullo) - 16 km / 9.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Turismo is Verona (VRN-Valerio Catullo) - 16 km / 10 mi.
